name: Legate Cipius
role: Legate overseeing Whiterun's inner defensive preparations

aspects.high_concept: Methodical Imperial Legate Who Plans for Every Contingency
aspects.trouble: My Caution Can Be a Liability When Speed Is Required
other_aspects: Fifteen Years of Borders and Battlefields

stunts: Prepared Positions: If given at least one scene to prepare, Cipius creates a free-invoke aspect on any defensive zone (battlefield engineering).
Legion Logistics: +2 to Resources when requisitioning Imperial military supplies in an active theater.
Verify and Respond: +2 to Tactics when reacting to an enemy action (not initiating).

equipment.special: Defensive plans for Whiterun, cipher keys for Legion dispatches

personality_notes.speaking_style: Methodical and detailed. Always qualifies statements with conditions. Rarely expresses emotion overtly but shows it through precision.
quirks: Mentally maps every space he enters
Always wants verification before acting - contrasts with Caius
Unusually good at estimating enemy strength from indirect signs

relationships.Commander Caius: Professional complement; their contrasting styles work well together
relationships.Legate Rikke: Deep respect; considers her the model Imperial officer
relationships.Irileth: Appreciates her tactical rigor; mutual professional courtesy

combat_tactics: Cipius fights from prepared positions. Uses terrain advantages he has identified in advance. Retreats in good order when conditions turn against him.
scene_triggers: Battle of Whiterun Stage 0 (War Room Briefing - Imperial)
Stormcloak drawbridge push - Stage 2 (as Imperial commander being referenced)
